title: What to Eat - A Recipe Recommendation Engine ðŸŒ­ðŸ¥«
description: What to Eat is a recipe recommendation engine that suggests recipes based on your dietary preferences and ingredients on hand â€” helping reduce food waste and make meal planning easier.

body.raw:
![Recipe Generator UI](/img/what-to-eat/What-to-eat-1.png)
![Mockup Screen](/img/what-to-eat/What-to-eat-2.png)

> What to Eat takes the guesswork out of meal planning. Whether you're working with limited ingredients or specific dietary needs, this app helps you discover recipes that fit your lifestyle. ðŸ½ï¸
> It's also a step toward reducing food waste by helping you use what you already have at home. ðŸŒ

---

## ðŸ´ Try the App

- ðŸ‘‰ [Visit the App](https://what-to-eat-2.vercel.app/)
- ðŸ’» [View Code on GitHub](https://github.com/applescan/what-to-eat-2)
- ðŸš€ [Featured on Product Hunt](https://www.producthunt.com/products/what-to-eat-2)

---

## ðŸ’¡ Why This Project?

This started as a fun side project to explore **TypeScript** and **Next.js**.
Itâ€™s grown into a tool I actually use when I donâ€™t know what to cook. ðŸ¤“

---

## ðŸŽ¯ Goals

- âœ… Help users **reduce food waste**
- âœ… Make meal planning easier
- âœ… Inspire people to **cook more at home**
- âœ… Empower users with dietary restrictions

---

## ðŸ§‘â€ðŸ³ How to Use

1. Click **"Get Recipe"** on the homepage
2. Choose your dietary preferences
3. Enter ingredients you have
4. Hit **Next** to get personalized recipe ideas
5. Click on a recipe to view details

---

## ðŸ› Known Limitations

- Typos in ingredients may cause search failures â€” user input must be precise
- Occasionally, the Spoonacular API may return ingredients outside selected dietary filters

---

## ðŸš€ Future Enhancements

- Integrate **NLP** to auto-correct input typos in the ingredient form
- Add **meal planning** features
- Let users **save favorite recipes** for future access

---

## ðŸ›  Built With

- T3 Stack
- React
- TypeScript
- Next.js
- Prisma
- Tailwind CSS
- tRPC
- NextAuth.js
- Spoonacular API
- Canva / Figma

---

## ðŸ“± Live App

> Explore recipe at
> ðŸ‘‰ [https://what-to-eat-2.vercel.app/](https://what-to-eat-2.vercel.app/)
